# Sealing Release Technique

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Ninjutsu, F큰injutsu
- Class: Supplementary
- Range: Short
- Users: Ch큰kaku
- Media: Anime

## Summary
After throwing prayer beads on the sealed victim, Ch큰kaku begins to mumble words while performing ritual hand movements, leading the seal formula to slowly disappear. This technique seems to take concentration and strength since Ch큰kaku looked troubled while performing it.
